data.message:
Here are the pages where you can download and check out The 3irdd

You can visit our Reverbnation page on:
www.reverbnation.com/the3irdd

or download straight to your phone with these links:

"lonely winter" ft Lunga Msimang- download link:
http://www1.datafilehost.com/d/f2723e68

"you"-  Link download:
http://www1.datafilehost.com/d/b674834e

or also visit our Soundcloud page on:

https://soundcloud.com/the3irdd

or visit 

http://www.unsigned.com/the3irdd

or download the bands android app at:

http://www.reverbnation.com/the3irdd/android

Feel free to share with your friends/contacts.
